rows.name:
The Hr√¶svelgr Mercenaries have
really come on in leaps and bounds.

rows.label: tlk43420145_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Bet they're stronger than even
when Vandham was in charge.

rows.label: tlk43420145_04_msg0003
rows.name:
When you go back to base
after a long absence, do you
have lots of new recruits?

rows.label: tlk43420145_04_msg0004
rows.name:
If you want to be a truly great leader,
it's important to remember the faces
of the mercenaries you command.

rows.label: tlk43420145_04_msg0005
rows.name: Do you think you could name them?
